briefdescription.para: Maximum size of VDMA buffer.
Macro for computing size of the array of reduced job structures.

parameterdescription.para: Number of jobs to be stored in reduced job list.

briefdescription.para: Macro for defining an element of a job list.

simplesect.para: Two words of the job descriptor.

briefdescription.para: Macro for defining initial element of reduced job list.

simplesect.para: Two words of the job descriptor.

briefdescription.para: Macro for defining a job for transfer engaging peripheral.

simplesect.para: Two words which contains address, size and the descriptor byte.

briefdescription.para: Data is not modified.
Data bytes are swapped.
Allows chaining of joblists.
Insters zeros into sink data buffers. Sink job attribute only.
Identical job attributes and sizes for all jobs in the list.
CRC checksum is calculated on all data in the source list.
Memory address is fixed for the entirety of the job.
Used to get better write performance when many short bursts are beiing sent.
VDMA attributes.

simplesect.para: Only one attribute can be set for the job.

briefdescription.para: VDMA extended attributes.

simplesect.para: This attributes can be combined with each other and with standard attribute

briefdescription.para: Type describing VDMA job with fixed attributes and length.
Function for filling the specified structure of the job with given job parameters.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of the job to be filled.

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the specified structure of the job with fixed attributes.

detaileddescription.para: First element of reduced job list occupies space for two elements.

simplesect.para: Use nrf_vdma_job_terminate() to terminate reduced job list.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the reduced structure of the job to be filled.

briefdescription.para: Function for filling the specified reduced structure of the job with given buffer pointer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the reduced structure of the job to be filled.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the pointer to the buffer associated with specified job.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of the specified job.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the size of the buffer associated with specified job.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of the specified job.

briefdescription.para: Function for terminating the specified job.

detaileddescription.para: When VectorDMA encounters job that is terminated, processing of the job list stops.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of the job to be terminated.

briefdescription.para: Function for linking the job with another job.

detaileddescription.para: When VectorDMA encounters job that is linked to another job, execution of the linked job starts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of the job to become link.
Pointer to the structure of the job to be linked.
